H0.text: oppo is sponsor of which country 's national cricket team. Australia

H1.text: oppo is sponsor of which country 's national cricket team. Pakistan

H2.text: oppo is sponsor of which country 's national cricket team. England

H3.text: oppo is sponsor of which country 's national cricket team. India

A4.text: The team's official sponsors has been Pepsi since 1993.

A5.text: As of 2019, Pakistan is sponsored by AJ Sports, replacing CA Sports, which was the sponsor between 2015 and 2019.

A6.text: In 2017, Oppo won the bid to sponsor the India national cricket team, which allowed their logo to be used on the team's kits from 2017 to 2019.
